comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Riano was the Spanish Ambassador to the US. His full name was Don Juan Riano y Gayangos es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Juan_Ria%C3%B1o_y_Gayangos Time Magazine of August 9, 1926 announced his resignation from the position of Ambassador Extraordinary and Minister Plenipotentiary of His Most Catholic Majesty Alfonso XIII of Spain. www.time.com/time/magazine/article/0,9171,722236,00.html He had been at the embassy since 1900, when his title was First Secretary of the Spanish Legation.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: swanq :  Thank you for the more complete names for Luis Elguero and Don Juan Riano y Gayangos.  We will add them to the description when we update.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Photo appears to have been taken at Niagara Falls, Ontario, during the inter-American Peace Conference, in 1914.
